name: Galaxian Sleena
summary: Galaxian Sleena is a fast paced Shoot 'em up for the whole family! Prepare to have a swollen trigger finger as you shoot down aliens and battle four Sleena Overlords while traversing the alien megastructure. You only have a single ship to combat the enemy but luckily it has been armed with a powerful laser cannon that makes quick work of the Sleena's minions. Can you beat the Galaxian Sleena?
